author: Megan Molteni, Gregory Barber
title: How a Crispr Lab Became a Pop-Up Covid Testing Center
description: As the government fumbled Covid-19 testing, researchers at UC Berkeley's Innovative Genomics Institute stepped up—with their own time and funding.
content: As the passengers disembarked, Julia Schaletzky, head of Berkeleys Center for Emerging and Neglected Diseases, watched the news coverage with frustration. The federal governments testing failures were, by then, well-acknowledged. At first, the Centers for Dis… [+3536 chars]
